Class PidController

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Block, Continuous, Siso

    public class PidController
extends StateSpaceModel
implements Siso
    Author:
    jcsombria DiscretePidController Class to implement a continuous PID controller. ________ setpoint ---| | output ---| PID(s) |---- control action tracking ---|________|
